column1: Lagarto is a municipality located in the Brazilian state of Sergipe. Its population is greater than 103
column2: 576 inhabitants (2018 est.) and its area is 969 kmÂ².Football player Diego Costa was born and raised in Lagarto. The city has one football team called Lagarto Futebol Clube who were founded in 2009 and currently play in the Campeonato Sergipano.
